title: (x) Extra high contrast Didone? - ITC Firenze {Jan}
content:
Do you happen to know what font was used to make this? The heavy duty Bodoni-looking one.  
Thanks!

comments.content:
Looks like ITC Firenze.  
 [http://e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/type/f/firenze%20.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414144608/http:/e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/type/f/firenze%20.html "http://e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/type/f/firenze%20.html")  
Hard to find these days.
